item.title: ARM_AC5_to_AC6
item.description: Migrate ARM Compiler 5 to ARM Compiler 6 部分笔记 Incompatible Language Extensions ARM Compiler 5 ARM Compiler 6 CMSIS (Recommended) __align(x) __attribute__((aligned(x))) __ALIGNED(x) __alignof__ __alignof__ __ALIGNOF__ __alignof__ __asm See Assembler Migration __ASM __const __attribute__((const)) __forceinline __attribute__((always_inline)) __global_reg Not supported __inline __inline__.
